nodes.text: Niorde was a planet in a star system of that same name in the Unknown Regions.

The planet was home to Near-Human species called the Niordi. During the Clone Wars, the Niordi were at war with a neighboring planet who hired members of the Leech Legions to fight against the Noirdi. Some Niordi scouts including D'harhan became cybernetically altered to become living weapons. However, despite D'harhan and the others, Niorde fell to the Leech Legions.
